Game.Name: Pocket Music (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Pocket Music is a Rhythm / Music game, developed by Jester Interactive and published by Rage Software, which was released in Europe in 2001.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/581362.html
Game.Notes: Make music on the move with Pocket Music, the music creation game. Create your own music from a selection of samples, drum beats, baselines, melodies, and other musical instruments. Play them back, save them to your cartridge, or swap them with a friend.
